attributes.action: Inform the public about compensation costs paid to private healthcare companies for NHS care, whos services are procured then discontinued. Let people know where their taxes are really going!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
One example (of many) is the plug being pulled on Care UK's mobile diagnostic centre in the West Midlands - closed because of "unacceptably low rates of use". The amount of compensation paid runs into the millions, but has been claimed to be "commercially sensitive".
  Surely this amount of money would make a considerable difference to cash strapped NHS facilities which are always in demand?
